entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
